pr_title: Removes plurals library to restore chinese support in lens

timeline.bodyText: @jxc928 @jxc928 @uckyk @hanahmily can some of you help us finish this translation file? It is missing many text
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt

timeline.bodyText: @jeqo @jcchavezs can you help with this and also "{0} Results"?
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt

replies.bodyText:

timeline.message:
Removes plurals library to restore chinese support in lens

Fixes https://github.com/openzipkin/zipkin-support/issues/12

Removes plurals library to restore chinese support in lens

Fixes https://github.com/openzipkin/zipkin-support/issues/12
